creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: six total lines; four full lines of expressive, bold, angular calligraphy; the two lines near the L are shorter; small rectangular relief stamp URC; two square stamps, one intaglio, one relief, at LLC; ink stain on R edge LRC
markings: URC, rectangular relief; LLC, square intaglio; LLC, square relief; on back, bottom center, in pencil: [Onuma Chinzan]
title: Quatrain in cursive Script
